content: Congrats on turning 37.  Kevin Smith is throwing a 37th birthday bash near his home town, in Red Bank, NJ at the Count Basie theater: http://www.newsaskew.com/includes/feature.shtml?id=EEZlEyFVyuMsBboAed&style=single.  I'll be there, and there are still tickets available if you can get to NJ for the Aug. 2nd show.
I'm only 25. In hex. Happy birthday Harry.
